name: World of Phenomena Ch 1
description:
Overview

In a world of magic, Luana and Hatil set out to find Aidan, who was like a father to them. He had promised to return home soon, but never came back. On their journey, they come across many strange events known as phenomena: strange and unexplainable occurrences. These phenomena are a side effect of magic. Sometimes, they bring great miracles. But other times, they cause terrifying disasters.

Luana and Hatil are caught by numerous disastrous phenomena. They as well as others are swept along with the whims of phenomena. The formerly simple journey expands and they find their fates intertwined with the secrets of the world.

Note

If you run into any issue that prevents you from playing the game, you can also view a video recording of the VN here.
